'''Nightfall''' is the fourth track for [[Blind Guardian]]'s Tolkien themed album, ''[[Nightfall in Middle-Earth]]''. It is the lament of [[Fëanor]] and his sons for the death of [[Finwë]] and the theft of the [[Silmarils]], and their [[Oath of Fëanor|oath]] and rebellion against the [[Valar]].
